itemDescription: British author, expert on maritime art, and former curator of the National Maritime Museum, Greenwich, east London

wikipedia_page.main: Dr James Taylor MA (Hons), FRSA (born 1963) is a British author, expert on maritime art, and former curator of the National Maritime Museum, Greenwich, east London.
